      • createCampaign

        public void createCampaign(java.lang.String start,
                           java.lang.String end,
                           java.lang.String item,
                           java.lang.String disrate,
                           java.util.ArrayList<Campaign> campaigns)
        creates a campaign for a specific item type. does not create a campaign if discount rate is bigger than %50
        Parameters:
        start - start date
        end - end date
        item - item type that the campaign is for
        disrate - discount rate of the campaign
        campaigns - all campaigns that exists
